main event: A triangular-shaped object with lights was observed over the James River in Newport News, Virginia.
interesting points: The object had a white light at the apex and orange and white lights at the base, forming a triangular shape.
The object approached to within about 3/4 mile of the observers, a group of high school students using binoculars.
The object was estimated to be about the size of a DC-9 aircraft and appeared metallic.
The object descended toward the south and then turned toward the northwest before disappearing from view.
The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes, during which time a dull thud was heard.
